name: dockerhub2ci
description: Handle Dockerhub Webhooks to trigger CI or perform other tasks

scripts.postdeploy: bundle exec rake db:schema:load && bundle exec rake db:seed

GEMFILE_LOAD_RUBY_VERSION.description: Load the ruby version in the Gemfile. Required by Heroku

TRAVIS_TOKEN.description: API token for travis. You can generate this token by running 'travis token --org'

WEBHOOK_SUBSCRIBERS.description: A list of Webhook subscribers that will run when Dockerhub webhook is received (separated by a semicolon (;))

API_KEYS.description: A list of API keys that are used to by the Webhook to authenticate (separated by a semicolon (;))

SAVE_WEBHOOKS.description: Set this to 1 to keep a copy of the webhooks in the database
